passive.name: TAILWIND
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TAILWIND
                                Passively gains 5% Movement Speed. Nearby allied champions also gain this bonus.

q.name: (Q) HOWLING GALE
q.description:
(Q) HOWLING GALE
 1s   50 
                                
                                
                                Charges up for 0.75 seconds and summons a powerful whirlwind that deals 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  ) and knocks up enemies in its path. The whirlwind always reaches its destination in 0.5 seconds.This ability's charges are stored once every 14 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

w.name: (W) ZEPHYR
w.description:
(W) ZEPHYR
 9/8/7/6s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Gains 10/25/20/25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. The wind spirit automatically searches for the nearest 3 campions within range, granting Movement Speed bonuses to allies and dealing 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  + 20% bonus  ) to enemies.
notes: range, granting Movement Speed bonuses to allies and dealing 50 magic damage (50/90/130/170 + 50%  + 20% bonus  ) to enemies

e.name: (E) EYE OF THE STORM
e.description:
(E) EYE OF THE STORM
 16/14/12/10s   70/80/90/100 
                                
                                
                                Blesses herself and the allied champion with the lowers Health with a shield that absorbs 65 damage (65/90/115/140 + 45% ) and grants 10 Attack Damage (10/20/30/40 + 10% ) while it holds. Lasts for 3 seconds.If there is a turret within range, applies a shield to the turret as well.
notes: range, applies a shield to the turret as well

r.name: (R) MONSOON
r.description:
(R) MONSOON
 80/75/70s   100 
                                
                                
                                Calls forth mighty winds of salvation to knock back surrounding enemies and restore 50 Health (50/100/150 + 30% ) to nearby allies each second for 3 seconds.

starting_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold. 3 charges; recharges every 35 seconds.
starting_items_detailed.description: Starting support item for tanky supports. Provides sustain and gold generation for both you and your ADC.

boots_detailed.name: Ionian Boots Of Lucidity
boots_detailed.description: Details for Ionian Boots Of Lucidity

boots_detailed.active: Shield nearby allies for 2.5 seconds, absorbing up to 150 damage
boots_detailed.description: Boot enchant that provides team protection. Essential for supports who want to shield their team.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold.
situational_items_detailed.active: Ward: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 150 seconds (4 charges, refills upon visiting shop)
situational_items_detailed.description: Upgraded support item that provides health, sustain, and vision control. Essential for tanky supports.

situational_items_detailed.name: Ionian Boots Of Lucidity

example_build_detailed.passive: Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% health. Killing a minion heals the nearest allied champion for 50 health and grants them kill gold.
example_build_detailed.active: Ward: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 150 seconds (4 charges, refills upon visiting shop)
example_build_detailed.description: Upgraded support item that provides health, sustain, and vision control. Essential for tanky supports.

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.name: Font of Life
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Font of Life
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
